22/* DMA Channels definition */
23#define SUBGHZ_DMA DMA2
24#define SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_CHANNEL LL_DMA_CHANNEL_1
25#define SUBGHZ_DMA_CH2_CHANNEL LL_DMA_CHANNEL_2
26#define SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_IRQ FuriHalInterruptIdDma2Ch1
27#define SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_DEF SUBGHZ_DMA, SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_CHANNEL
28#define SUBGHZ_DMA_CH2_DEF SUBGHZ_DMA, SUBGHZ_DMA_CH2_CHANNEL
29
31typedef enum {
32 SubGhzStateInit,
33 SubGhzStateBroken,
34 SubGhzStateIdle,
36 SubGhzStateAsyncRx,
38 SubGhzStateAsyncTx,
39 SubGhzStateAsyncTxLast,
40 SubGhzStateAsyncTxEnd,
42} SubGhzState;
43
46typedef enum {
47 SubGhzRegulationOnlyRx,
48 SubGhzRegulationTxRx,
49} SubGhzRegulation;
50
51typedef struct {
52 volatile SubGhzState state;
53 volatile SubGhzRegulation regulation;
54 const GpioPin* async_mirror_pin;
55
56 int8_t rolling_counter_mult;
57 bool ext_power_amp : 1;
58 bool extended_frequency_i : 1;
59} FuriHalSubGhz;
60
61volatile FuriHalSubGhz furi_hal_subghz = {
62 .state = SubGhzStateInit,
63 .regulation = SubGhzRegulationTxRx,
64 .async_mirror_pin = NULL,
65 .rolling_counter_mult = 1,
66 .ext_power_amp = false,
67 .extended_frequency_i = false,
68};
69

71 return furi_hal_subghz.rolling_counter_mult;

75 furi_hal_subghz.rolling_counter_mult = mult;

94const GpioPin* furi_hal_subghz_get_data_gpio() {
95 return &gpio_cc1101_g0;

97
98void furi_hal_subghz_init() {
99 furi_assert(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateInit);
100 furi_hal_subghz.state = SubGhzStateBroken;
101
102 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
103 do {
104#ifdef FURI_HAL_SUBGHZ_TX_GPIO
105 furi_hal_gpio_init(
106 &FURI_HAL_SUBGHZ_TX_GPIO, GpioModeOutputPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
107#endif
108
109 // Reset
110 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
111 cc1101_reset(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
112 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG0, CC1101IocfgHighImpedance);
113
114 // Prepare GD0 for power on self test
115 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeInput, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
116
117 // GD0 low
118 FuriHalCortexTimer timeout = furi_hal_cortex_timer_get(10000);
119 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG0, CC1101IocfgHW);
120 while(furi_hal_gpio_read(&gpio_cc1101_g0) != false &&
121 !furi_hal_cortex_timer_is_expired(timeout))
122 ;
123
124 if(furi_hal_gpio_read(&gpio_cc1101_g0) != false) {
125 break;
126 }
127
128 // GD0 high
129 timeout = furi_hal_cortex_timer_get(10000);
130 cc1101_write_reg(
131 &furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG0, CC1101IocfgHW | CC1101_IOCFG_INV);
132 while(furi_hal_gpio_read(&gpio_cc1101_g0) != true &&
133 !furi_hal_cortex_timer_is_expired(timeout))
134 ;
135
136 if(furi_hal_gpio_read(&gpio_cc1101_g0) != true) {
137 break;
138 }
139
140 // Reset GD0 to floating state
141 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG0, CC1101IocfgHighImpedance);
142 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
143
144 // RF switches
145 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_rf_sw_0, GpioModeOutputPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
146 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG2, CC1101IocfgHW);
147
148 // Go to sleep
149 cc1101_shutdown(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
150
151 furi_hal_subghz.state = SubGhzStateIdle;
152 } while(false);
153
154 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
155
156 if(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateIdle) {
157 FURI_LOG_I(TAG, "Init OK");
158 } else {
159 FURI_LOG_E(TAG, "Init Fail");
160 }
161}
162
163void furi_hal_subghz_sleep() {
164 furi_assert(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateIdle);
165 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
166
167 cc1101_switch_to_idle(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
168
169 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG0, CC1101IocfgHighImpedance);
170 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
171
172 cc1101_shutdown(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
173
174 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
175}
176
177void furi_hal_subghz_dump_state() {
178 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
179 printf(
180 "[furi_hal_subghz] cc1101 chip %d, version %d\r\n",
181 cc1101_get_partnumber(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz),
182 cc1101_get_version(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz));
183 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
184}
185
186void furi_hal_subghz_load_custom_preset(const uint8_t* preset_data) {
187 //load config
188 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
189 cc1101_reset(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
190 uint32_t i = 0;
191 uint8_t pa[8] = {0};
192 while(preset_data[i]) {
193 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, preset_data[i], preset_data[i + 1]);
194 i += 2;
195 }
196 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
197
198 //load pa table
199 memcpy(&pa[0], &preset_data[i + 2], 8);
200 furi_hal_subghz_load_patable(pa);
201
202 //show debug
203 if(furi_hal_rtc_is_flag_set(FuriHalRtcFlagDebug)) {
204 i = 0;
205 FURI_LOG_D(TAG, "Loading custom preset");
206 while(preset_data[i]) {
207 FURI_LOG_D(TAG, "Reg[%lu]: %02X=%02X", i, preset_data[i], preset_data[i + 1]);
208 i += 2;
209 }
210 for(uint8_t y = i; y < i + 10; y++) {
211 FURI_LOG_D(TAG, "PA[%u]: %02X", y, preset_data[y]);
212 }
213 }
214}
215
216void furi_hal_subghz_load_registers(const uint8_t* data) {
217 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
218 cc1101_reset(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
219 uint32_t i = 0;
220 while(data[i]) {
221 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, data[i], data[i + 1]);
222 i += 2;
223 }
224 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
225}
226
227void furi_hal_subghz_load_patable(const uint8_t data[8]) {
228 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
229 cc1101_set_pa_table(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, data);
230 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
231}
232
233void furi_hal_subghz_write_packet(const uint8_t* data, uint8_t size) {
234 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
235 cc1101_flush_tx(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
236 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_FIFO, size);
237 cc1101_write_fifo(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, data, size);
238 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
239}
240
241void furi_hal_subghz_flush_rx() {
242 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
243 cc1101_flush_rx(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
244 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
245}
246
247void furi_hal_subghz_flush_tx() {
248 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
249 cc1101_flush_tx(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
250 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
251}
252
253bool furi_hal_subghz_rx_pipe_not_empty() {
254 CC1101RxBytes status[1];
255 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
256 cc1101_read_reg(
257 &furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, (CC1101_STATUS_RXBYTES) | CC1101_BURST, (uint8_t*)status);
258 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
259 // TODO: Find reason why RXFIFO_OVERFLOW doesnt work correctly
260 if(status->NUM_RXBYTES > 0) {
261 return true;
262 } else {
263 return false;
264 }
265}
266
267bool furi_hal_subghz_is_rx_data_crc_valid() {
268 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
269 uint8_t data[1];
270 cc1101_read_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_STATUS_LQI | CC1101_BURST, data);
271 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
272 if(((data[0] >> 7) & 0x01)) {
273 return true;
274 } else {
275 return false;
276 }
277}
278
279void furi_hal_subghz_read_packet(uint8_t* data, uint8_t* size) {
280 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
281 cc1101_read_fifo(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, data, size);
282 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
283}
284
285void furi_hal_subghz_shutdown() {
286 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
287 // Reset and shutdown
288 cc1101_shutdown(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
289 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
290}
291
292void furi_hal_subghz_reset() {
293 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
294 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
295 cc1101_switch_to_idle(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
296 cc1101_reset(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
297 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG0, CC1101IocfgHighImpedance);
298 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
299}
300
301void furi_hal_subghz_idle() {
302 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
303 cc1101_switch_to_idle(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
304 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
305}
306
307void furi_hal_subghz_rx() {
308 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
309 cc1101_switch_to_rx(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
310 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
311}
312
313bool furi_hal_subghz_tx() {
314 if(furi_hal_subghz.regulation != SubGhzRegulationTxRx) return false;
315 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
316 cc1101_switch_to_tx(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
317 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
318 return true;
319}
320
321float furi_hal_subghz_get_rssi() {
322 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
323 int32_t rssi_dec = cc1101_get_rssi(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
324 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
325
326 float rssi = rssi_dec;
327 if(rssi_dec >= 128) {
328 rssi = ((rssi - 256.0f) / 2.0f) - 74.0f;
329 } else {
330 rssi = (rssi / 2.0f) - 74.0f;
331 }
332
333 return rssi;
334}
335
336uint8_t furi_hal_subghz_get_lqi() {
337 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
338 uint8_t data[1];
339 cc1101_read_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_STATUS_LQI | CC1101_BURST, data);
340 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
341 return data[0] & 0x7F;
342}
343
344/*
345 Modified by @tkerby & MX to the full YARD Stick One extended range of 281-361 MHz, 378-481 MHz, and 749-962 MHz.
346 These changes are at your own risk. The PLL may not lock and FZ devs have warned of possible damage!
347 */
348
349bool furi_hal_subghz_is_frequency_valid(uint32_t value) {
350 if(!(value >= 281000000 && value <= 361000000) &&
351 !(value >= 378000000 && value <= 481000000) &&
352 !(value >= 749000000 && value <= 962000000)) {
353 return false;
354 }
355
356 return true;
357}
358
359uint32_t furi_hal_subghz_set_frequency_and_path(uint32_t value) {
360 // Set these values to the extended frequency range only. They dont define if you can transmit but do select the correct RF path
361 value = furi_hal_subghz_set_frequency(value);
362 if(value >= 281000000 && value <= 361000000) {
363 furi_hal_subghz_set_path(FuriHalSubGhzPath315);
364 } else if(value >= 378000000 && value <= 481000000) {
365 furi_hal_subghz_set_path(FuriHalSubGhzPath433);
366 } else if(value >= 749000000 && value <= 962000000) {
367 furi_hal_subghz_set_path(FuriHalSubGhzPath868);
368 } else {
369 furi_crash("SubGhz: Incorrect frequency during set.");
370 }
371 return value;
372}
373
374bool furi_hal_subghz_is_tx_allowed(uint32_t value) {
375 bool allow_extended_for_int = furi_hal_subghz.extended_frequency_i;
376
377 if(!(allow_extended_for_int) &&
378 !(value >= 299999755 && value <= 350000335) && // was increased from 348 to 350
379 !(value >= 386999938 && value <= 467750000) && // was increased from 464 to 467.75
380 !(value >= 778999847 && value <= 928000000)) {
381 FURI_LOG_I(TAG, "Frequency blocked - outside default range");
382 return false;
383 } else if(
384 (allow_extended_for_int) && //
385 !furi_hal_subghz_is_frequency_valid(value)) {
386 FURI_LOG_I(TAG, "Frequency blocked - outside extended range");
387 return false;
388 }
389
390 return true;
391}
392
393uint32_t furi_hal_subghz_set_frequency(uint32_t value) {
394 if(furi_hal_subghz_is_tx_allowed(value)) {
395 furi_hal_subghz.regulation = SubGhzRegulationTxRx;
396 } else {
397 furi_hal_subghz.regulation = SubGhzRegulationOnlyRx;
398 }
399
400 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
401 uint32_t real_frequency = cc1101_set_frequency(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, value);
402 cc1101_calibrate(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
403
404 while(true) {
405 CC1101Status status = cc1101_get_status(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
406 if(status.STATE == CC1101StateIDLE) break;
407 }
408
409 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
410 return real_frequency;
411}
412
413void furi_hal_subghz_set_path(FuriHalSubGhzPath path) {
414 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
415 if(path == FuriHalSubGhzPath433) {
416 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_rf_sw_0, 0);
417 cc1101_write_reg(
418 &furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG2, CC1101IocfgHW | CC1101_IOCFG_INV);
419 } else if(path == FuriHalSubGhzPath315) {
420 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_rf_sw_0, 1);
421 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG2, CC1101IocfgHW);
422 } else if(path == FuriHalSubGhzPath868) {
423 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_rf_sw_0, 1);
424 cc1101_write_reg(
425 &furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG2, CC1101IocfgHW | CC1101_IOCFG_INV);
426 } else if(path == FuriHalSubGhzPathIsolate) {
427 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_rf_sw_0, 0);
428 cc1101_write_reg(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz, CC1101_IOCFG2, CC1101IocfgHW);
429 } else {
430 furi_crash("SubGhz: Incorrect path during set.");
431 }
432 furi_hal_spi_release(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_subghz);
433}
434
435static bool furi_hal_subghz_start_debug() {
436 bool ret = false;
437 if(furi_hal_subghz.async_mirror_pin != NULL) {
438 furi_hal_gpio_init(
439 furi_hal_subghz.async_mirror_pin,
440 GpioModeOutputPushPull,
441 GpioPullNo,
442 GpioSpeedVeryHigh);
443 ret = true;
444 }
445 return ret;
446}
447
448static bool furi_hal_subghz_stop_debug() {
449 bool ret = false;
450 if(furi_hal_subghz.async_mirror_pin != NULL) {
451 furi_hal_gpio_init(
452 furi_hal_subghz.async_mirror_pin, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
453 ret = true;
454 }
455 return ret;
456}
457
458volatile uint32_t furi_hal_subghz_capture_delta_duration = 0;
459volatile FuriHalSubGhzCaptureCallback furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback = NULL;
460volatile void* furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback_context = NULL;
461
462static void furi_hal_subghz_capture_ISR() {
463 // Channel 1
464 if(LL_TIM_IsActiveFlag_CC1(TIM2)) {
465 LL_TIM_ClearFlag_CC1(TIM2);
466 furi_hal_subghz_capture_delta_duration = LL_TIM_IC_GetCaptureCH1(TIM2);
467 if(furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback) {
468 if(furi_hal_subghz.async_mirror_pin != NULL)
469 furi_hal_gpio_write(furi_hal_subghz.async_mirror_pin, false);
470
471 furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback(
472 true,
473 furi_hal_subghz_capture_delta_duration,
474 (void*)furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback_context);
475 }
476 }
477 // Channel 2
478 if(LL_TIM_IsActiveFlag_CC2(TIM2)) {
479 LL_TIM_ClearFlag_CC2(TIM2);
480 if(furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback) {
481 if(furi_hal_subghz.async_mirror_pin != NULL)
482 furi_hal_gpio_write(furi_hal_subghz.async_mirror_pin, true);
483
484 furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback(
485 false,
486 LL_TIM_IC_GetCaptureCH2(TIM2) - furi_hal_subghz_capture_delta_duration,
487 (void*)furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback_context);
488 }
489 }
490}
491
492void furi_hal_subghz_start_async_rx(FuriHalSubGhzCaptureCallback callback, void* context) {
493 furi_assert(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateIdle);
494 furi_hal_subghz.state = SubGhzStateAsyncRx;
495
496 furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback = callback;
497 furi_hal_subghz_capture_callback_context = context;
498
499 furi_hal_gpio_init_ex(
500 &gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeAltFunctionPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow, GpioAltFn1TIM2);
501
502 furi_hal_bus_enable(FuriHalBusTIM2);
503
504 // Timer: base
505 LL_TIM_InitTypeDef TIM_InitStruct = {0};
506 TIM_InitStruct.Prescaler = 64 - 1;
507 TIM_InitStruct.CounterMode = LL_TIM_COUNTERMODE_UP;
508 TIM_InitStruct.Autoreload = 0x7FFFFFFE;
509 // Clock division for capture filter
510 TIM_InitStruct.ClockDivision = LL_TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV4;
511 LL_TIM_Init(TIM2, &TIM_InitStruct);
512
513 // Timer: advanced
514 LL_TIM_SetClockSource(TIM2, LL_TIM_CLOCKSOURCE_INTERNAL);
515 LL_TIM_DisableARRPreload(TIM2);
516 LL_TIM_SetTriggerInput(TIM2, LL_TIM_TS_TI2FP2);
517 LL_TIM_SetSlaveMode(TIM2, LL_TIM_SLAVEMODE_RESET);
518 LL_TIM_SetTriggerOutput(TIM2, LL_TIM_TRGO_RESET);
519 LL_TIM_EnableMasterSlaveMode(TIM2);
520 LL_TIM_DisableDMAReq_TRIG(TIM2);
521 LL_TIM_DisableIT_TRIG(TIM2);
522
523 // Timer: channel 1 indirect
524 LL_TIM_IC_SetActiveInput(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1, LL_TIM_ACTIVEINPUT_INDIRECTTI);
525 LL_TIM_IC_SetPrescaler(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1, LL_TIM_ICPSC_DIV1);
526 LL_TIM_IC_SetPolarity(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1, LL_TIM_IC_POLARITY_FALLING);
527
528 // Timer: channel 2 direct
529 LL_TIM_IC_SetActiveInput(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH2, LL_TIM_ACTIVEINPUT_DIRECTTI);
530 LL_TIM_IC_SetPrescaler(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH2, LL_TIM_ICPSC_DIV1);
531 LL_TIM_IC_SetPolarity(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH2, LL_TIM_IC_POLARITY_RISING);
532 LL_TIM_IC_SetFilter(
533 TIM2,
534 LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH2,
535 LL_TIM_IC_FILTER_FDIV32_N8); // Capture filter: 1/(64000000/64/4/32*8) = 16us
536
537 // ISR setup
538 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(FuriHalInterruptIdTIM2, furi_hal_subghz_capture_ISR, NULL);
539
540 // Interrupts and channels
541 LL_TIM_EnableIT_CC1(TIM2);
542 LL_TIM_EnableIT_CC2(TIM2);
543 LL_TIM_CC_EnableChannel(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1);
544 LL_TIM_CC_EnableChannel(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH2);
545
546 // Start timer
547 LL_TIM_SetCounter(TIM2, 0);
548 LL_TIM_EnableCounter(TIM2);
549
550 // Start debug
551 furi_hal_subghz_start_debug();
552
553 // Switch to RX
554 furi_hal_subghz_rx();
555
556 // Clear the variable after the end of the session
557 furi_hal_subghz_capture_delta_duration = 0;
558}
559
560void furi_hal_subghz_stop_async_rx() {
561 furi_assert(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateAsyncRx);
562 furi_hal_subghz.state = SubGhzStateIdle;
563
564 // Shutdown radio
565 furi_hal_subghz_idle();
566
567 FURI_CRITICAL_ENTER();
568 furi_hal_bus_disable(FuriHalBusTIM2);
569
570 // Stop debug
571 furi_hal_subghz_stop_debug();
572
573 FURI_CRITICAL_EXIT();
574 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(FuriHalInterruptIdTIM2, NULL, NULL);
575
576 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
577}
578
579typedef struct {
580 uint32_t* buffer;
581 LevelDuration carry_ld;
582 FuriHalSubGhzAsyncTxCallback callback;
583 void* callback_context;
584 uint64_t duty_high;
585 uint64_t duty_low;
586} FuriHalSubGhzAsyncTx;
587
588static FuriHalSubGhzAsyncTx furi_hal_subghz_async_tx = {0};
589
590static void furi_hal_subghz_async_tx_refill(uint32_t* buffer, size_t samples) {
591 furi_assert(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateAsyncTx);
592 while(samples > 0) {
593 bool is_odd = samples % 2;
594 LevelDuration ld;
595 if(level_duration_is_reset(furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.carry_ld)) {
596 ld = furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.callback(furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.callback_context);
597 } else {
598 ld = furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.carry_ld;
599 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.carry_ld = level_duration_reset();
600 }
601
602 if(level_duration_is_wait(ld)) {
603 *buffer = API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_GUARD_TIME;
604 buffer++;
605 samples--;
606 } else if(level_duration_is_reset(ld)) {
607 *buffer = 0;
608 buffer++;
609 samples--;
610 LL_DMA_DisableIT_HT(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_DEF);
611 LL_DMA_DisableIT_TC(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_DEF);
612 LL_TIM_EnableIT_UPDATE(TIM2);
613 break;
614 } else {
615 bool level = level_duration_get_level(ld);
616
617 // Inject guard time if level is incorrect
618 if(is_odd != level) {
619 *buffer = API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_GUARD_TIME;
620 buffer++;
621 samples--;
622 if(is_odd) {
623 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_high += API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_GUARD_TIME;
624 } else {
625 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_low += API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_GUARD_TIME;
626 }
627
628 // Special case: prevent buffer overflow if sample is last
629 if(samples == 0) {
630 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.carry_ld = ld;
631 break;
632 }
633 }
634
635 uint32_t duration = level_duration_get_duration(ld);
636 furi_assert(duration > 0);
637 *buffer = duration;
638 buffer++;
639 samples--;
640
641 if(is_odd) {
642 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_high += duration;
643 } else {
644 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_low += duration;
645 }
646 }
647 }
648}
649
650static void furi_hal_subghz_async_tx_dma_isr() {
651 furi_assert(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateAsyncTx);
652
653#if SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_CHANNEL == LL_DMA_CHANNEL_1
654 if(LL_DMA_IsActiveFlag_HT1(SUBGHZ_DMA)) {
655 LL_DMA_ClearFlag_HT1(SUBGHZ_DMA);
656 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx_refill(
657 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.buffer, API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_BUFFER_HALF);
658 }
659 if(LL_DMA_IsActiveFlag_TC1(SUBGHZ_DMA)) {
660 LL_DMA_ClearFlag_TC1(SUBGHZ_DMA);
661 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx_refill(
662 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.buffer + API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_BUFFER_HALF,
663 API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_BUFFER_HALF);
664 }
665#else
666#error Update this code. Would you kindly?
667#endif
668}
669
670static void furi_hal_subghz_async_tx_timer_isr() {
671 if(LL_TIM_IsActiveFlag_UPDATE(TIM2)) {
672 LL_TIM_ClearFlag_UPDATE(TIM2);
673 if(LL_TIM_GetAutoReload(TIM2) == 0) {
674 if(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateAsyncTx) {
675 furi_hal_subghz.state = SubGhzStateAsyncTxLast;
676 LL_DMA_DisableChannel(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_DEF);
677 } else if(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateAsyncTxLast) {
678 furi_hal_subghz.state = SubGhzStateAsyncTxEnd;
679 //forcibly pulls the pin to the ground so that there is no carrier
680 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeInput, GpioPullDown, GpioSpeedLow);
681 LL_TIM_DisableCounter(TIM2);
682 } else {
683 furi_crash();
684 }
685 }
686 }
687}
688
689bool furi_hal_subghz_start_async_tx(FuriHalSubGhzAsyncTxCallback callback, void* context) {
690 furi_assert(furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateIdle);
691 furi_assert(callback);
692
693 //If transmission is prohibited by regional settings
694 if(furi_hal_subghz.regulation != SubGhzRegulationTxRx) return false;
695
696 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.callback = callback;
697 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.callback_context = context;
698
699 furi_hal_subghz.state = SubGhzStateAsyncTx;
700
701 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_low = 0;
702 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_high = 0;
703
704 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.buffer =
705 malloc(API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_BUFFER_FULL * sizeof(uint32_t));
706
707 // Connect CC1101_GD0 to TIM2 as output
708 furi_hal_gpio_init_ex(
709 &gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeAltFunctionPushPull, GpioPullDown, GpioSpeedLow, GpioAltFn1TIM2);
710
711 // Configure DMA
712 LL_DMA_InitTypeDef dma_config = {0};
713 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcAddress = (uint32_t) & (TIM2->ARR);
714 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstAddress = (uint32_t)furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.buffer;
715 dma_config.Direction = LL_DMA_DIRECTION_MEMORY_TO_PERIPH;
716 dma_config.Mode = LL_DMA_MODE_CIRCULAR;
717 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcIncMode = LL_DMA_PERIPH_NOINCREMENT;
718 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstIncMode = LL_DMA_MEMORY_INCREMENT;
719 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcDataSize = LL_DMA_PDATAALIGN_WORD;
720 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstDataSize = LL_DMA_MDATAALIGN_WORD;
721 dma_config.NbData = API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_BUFFER_FULL;
722 dma_config.PeriphRequest = LL_DMAMUX_REQ_TIM2_UP;
723 dma_config.Priority = LL_DMA_MODE_NORMAL;
724 LL_DMA_Init(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_DEF, &dma_config);
725 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_IRQ, furi_hal_subghz_async_tx_dma_isr, NULL);
726 LL_DMA_EnableIT_TC(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_DEF);
727 LL_DMA_EnableIT_HT(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_DEF);
728 LL_DMA_EnableChannel(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_DEF);
729
730 furi_hal_bus_enable(FuriHalBusTIM2);
731
732 // Configure TIM2
733 LL_TIM_InitTypeDef TIM_InitStruct = {0};
734 TIM_InitStruct.Prescaler = 64 - 1;
735 TIM_InitStruct.CounterMode = LL_TIM_COUNTERMODE_UP;
736 TIM_InitStruct.Autoreload = 1000;
737 TIM_InitStruct.ClockDivision = LL_TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV1;
738 LL_TIM_Init(TIM2, &TIM_InitStruct);
739 LL_TIM_SetClockSource(TIM2, LL_TIM_CLOCKSOURCE_INTERNAL);
740 LL_TIM_EnableARRPreload(TIM2);
741
742 // Configure TIM2 CH2
743 LL_TIM_OC_InitTypeDef TIM_OC_InitStruct = {0};
744 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCMode = LL_TIM_OCMODE_TOGGLE;
745 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCState = LL_TIM_OCSTATE_DISABLE;
746 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCNState = LL_TIM_OCSTATE_DISABLE;
747 TIM_OC_InitStruct.CompareValue = 0;
748 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCPolarity = LL_TIM_OCPOLARITY_LOW;
749 LL_TIM_OC_Init(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH2, &TIM_OC_InitStruct);
750 LL_TIM_OC_DisableFast(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH2);
751 LL_TIM_DisableMasterSlaveMode(TIM2);
752
753 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(FuriHalInterruptIdTIM2, furi_hal_subghz_async_tx_timer_isr, NULL);
754
755 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx_refill(
756 furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.buffer, API_HAL_SUBGHZ_ASYNC_TX_BUFFER_FULL);
757
758 LL_TIM_EnableDMAReq_UPDATE(TIM2);
759 LL_TIM_CC_EnableChannel(TIM2, LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH2);
760
761 // Start counter
762 LL_TIM_GenerateEvent_UPDATE(TIM2);
763#ifdef FURI_HAL_SUBGHZ_TX_GPIO
764 furi_hal_gpio_write(&FURI_HAL_SUBGHZ_TX_GPIO, true);
765#endif
766 furi_hal_subghz_tx();
767
768 LL_TIM_SetCounter(TIM2, 0);
769 LL_TIM_EnableCounter(TIM2);
770
771 // Start debug
772 if(furi_hal_subghz_start_debug()) {
773 const GpioPin* gpio = furi_hal_subghz.async_mirror_pin;
774 // //Preparing bit mask
775 // //Debug pin is may be only PORTB! (PB0, PB1, .., PB15)
776 // furi_hal_subghz_debug_gpio_buff[0] = 0;
777 // furi_hal_subghz_debug_gpio_buff[1] = 0;
778
779 furi_hal_subghz_debug_gpio_buff[0] = (uint32_t)gpio->pin << GPIO_NUMBER;
780 furi_hal_subghz_debug_gpio_buff[1] = gpio->pin;
781
782 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstAddress = (uint32_t)furi_hal_subghz_debug_gpio_buff;
783 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcAddress = (uint32_t) & (gpio->port->BSRR);
784 dma_config.Direction = LL_DMA_DIRECTION_MEMORY_TO_PERIPH;
785 dma_config.Mode = LL_DMA_MODE_CIRCULAR;
786 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcIncMode = LL_DMA_PERIPH_NOINCREMENT;
787 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstIncMode = LL_DMA_MEMORY_INCREMENT;
788 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcDataSize = LL_DMA_PDATAALIGN_WORD;
789 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstDataSize = LL_DMA_MDATAALIGN_WORD;
790 dma_config.NbData = 2;
791 dma_config.PeriphRequest = LL_DMAMUX_REQ_TIM2_UP;
792 dma_config.Priority = LL_DMA_PRIORITY_VERYHIGH;
793 LL_DMA_Init(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH2_DEF, &dma_config);
794 LL_DMA_SetDataLength(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH2_DEF, 2);
795 LL_DMA_EnableChannel(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH2_DEF);
796 }
797
798 return true;
799}
800
801bool furi_hal_subghz_is_async_tx_complete() {
802 return furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateAsyncTxEnd;
803}
804
805void furi_hal_subghz_stop_async_tx() {
806 furi_assert(
807 furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateAsyncTx ||
808 furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateAsyncTxLast ||
809 furi_hal_subghz.state == SubGhzStateAsyncTxEnd);
810
811 // Shutdown radio
812 furi_hal_subghz_idle();
813#ifdef FURI_HAL_SUBGHZ_TX_GPIO
814 furi_hal_gpio_write(&FURI_HAL_SUBGHZ_TX_GPIO, false);
815#endif
816
817 // Deinitialize Timer
818 FURI_CRITICAL_ENTER();
819 furi_hal_bus_disable(FuriHalBusTIM2);
820 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(FuriHalInterruptIdTIM2, NULL, NULL);
821
822 // Deinitialize DMA
823 LL_DMA_DeInit(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_DEF);
824
825 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH1_IRQ, NULL, NULL);
826
827 // Deinitialize GPIO
828 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_cc1101_g0, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
829
830 // Stop debug
831 if(furi_hal_subghz_stop_debug()) {
832 LL_DMA_DisableChannel(SUBGHZ_DMA_CH2_DEF);
833 }
834
835 FURI_CRITICAL_EXIT();
836
837 free(furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.buffer);
838
839 float duty_cycle =
840 100.0f * (float)furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_high /
841 ((float)furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_low + (float)furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_high);
842 FURI_LOG_D(
843 TAG,
844 "Async TX Radio stats: on %0.0fus, off %0.0fus, DutyCycle: %0.0f%%",
845 (double)furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_high,
846 (double)furi_hal_subghz_async_tx.duty_low,
847 (double)duty_cycle);
848
849 furi_hal_subghz.state = SubGhzStateIdle;
850}
